title: Sportanlage Stapfen
text: Sportanlage Stapfen is a <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Naters">Naters</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It is currently used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="FC%20Naters">FC Naters</a>. The capacity is 3,000. The stadium was opened in 1997.
